401.title: 401 Unauthorized
401.description: The server could not verify that you are authorized to access the URL requested. You either supplied the wrong credentials (e.g. a bad password), or your browser doesn't understand how to supply the credentials required.

403.title: 403 Forbidden
403.description: You don't have the permission to access the requested resource. It is either read-protected or not readable by the server.

404.title: 404 Not Found
404.description: The requested URL was not found on the server. If you entered the URL manually please check your spelling and try again.

500.title: 500 Internal Server Error
500.description: The server encountered an internal error and was unable to complete your request. Either the server is overloaded or there is an Error: the application.
